mema naya surakum yojana kramaya yatathe ihatha paridi naya mudal piyawima da jathika rakshana bhara aramudala wetha banku, mulya ha rakshana aayathana walin labena 1% ka gasthuwa thulin sidukere. 2016/2017 maha kannaye athiwu niyangayen gowinta siduwu waga hani hethuwen labagath naya piyawima sandaha rupiyal miliyana 500 ka pamana mudalak jathika rakshana bhara aramudala wisin bankuwalata gewimata siduwanu athayi danata ganan bala thibe. 2013.04.01 dina sita mema 1% waga badda kriyathmaka karana lada athara edina sita 2017 aprel masa 25 wana dina dakwa mema badda mangin jathika rakshana bhara aramudala wetha labi athi mulu mudala rupiyal miliyana 5,069.81 ki.
